title: Do you want Belauce "the guaranteed minimum income" for "illegal aliens" in the next COVID-19 initiative?
subtitle: The right-wing protestor filed the claim in the May 2020 tweet, while the federal leaders negotiated what should be included in the forthcoming COVID-19 economic relief package.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: On May 4, 2020, United States House President Nancy Pelosi said that she wanted the following federal government bill for economic relief during the Corona COVID-19 epidemic to define "the guaranteed minimum income" for "illegal aliens."
